### Commit 3
```{r commit 3}

star_df %>% 
  select(sex, frl, tmathss, treadss) %>% 
 
  group_by(sex, frl) %>% 
  summarize(math_mean = round(mean(tmathss), digits = 2),
           math_sd = round(sd(tmathss),digits = 2),
           rdg_mean = round(mean(treadss), digits = 2),
           rdg_sd = round(sd(treadss), digits = 2)
  ) %>% 
  gt()

  
```
